Well, after I saw it, I certainly knew what a samurai WASN'T...

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] The last samurai question
messages.msgSnippet: ... A more pointed question may be: How many people, having seen The Last Samurai, now think they know what a samurai is? Tony -- Anthony J. Bryant Website:
messages.messageBody:
mason wrote:
> How many poeple didnt know what a samurai was untile they saw The last
> samurai?

A more pointed question may be: How many people, having seen
"The Last Samurai," now think they know what a samurai is?

Tony
--

Anthony J. Bryant
Website: http://www.sengokudaimyo.com

Effingham's Heraldic Avatars (...and stuff):
http://www.sengokudaimyo.com/avatarbiz.html

All sorts of cool things Japanese and SCA:
http://www.cafepress.com/sengokudaimyo
